4.content:
Hello Kate!

Welcome to Trapezoid Health!
I am Daniel, the managing director of the company.
4.name: Dialogue

17.content: Congratulations on your new job as a Supply Chain Director.
17.name: Dialogue

293.content: Now let me show you your office.
293.name: Dialogue

23137.content: Your task is to allocate {drugName} inventory to meet our demand.
23137.name: Dialogue

23139.content: Just keep in mind that our customers might change the way they order from us based on how we deliver their products.
23139.name: Dialogue

24121.content: You can review your goal by clicking on this button.
24121.name: Dialogue

24153.action_text: Goal: Maximize Revenue! (Total sales revenue: ${costTotal}) Allocate {drugName} inventory to meet current demand in order to maximize sales revenue.
24153.name: Action

24294.content: You can check the sales revenue as well as inventory and backlog cost by clicking on this button.
24294.name: Dialogue

24315.action_text: For each unit of {drugName}: price is $5 inventory cost is $1 backlog cost is $10
24315.name: Action

24328.action_text: Last Week Cumulative SALES Sales - HC1 ${invCost} ${invCostCum} Sales - HC2 ${untreatedU} ${cumRepCostU} Total Sales ${costTotal} COSTS Inventory ${invCost} ${invCostCum} Backlog ${untreatedU} ${cumRepCostU} Total Cost ${costTotal} NET PROFIT $0 For each unit of {drugName}: sales price is $5 inventory cost is $1 backlog cost is $10
24328.name: Action

26264.content: Your main goal is to maximize the company's sales revenue and increase our market share by deciding how to allocate current {drugName} inventory to health-centers.
26264.name: Dialogue

26265.content: The company's overall cost consists of the inventory cost and the cost of stockout in case we're out of {drugName}.
26265.name: Dialogue

28119.content: Click or tap anywhere on the screen to move the game forward.
28119.name: Dialogue

28120.content: This game is part of a study on pharmaceutical supply chains.
28120.name: Dialogue

28122.content: You will be deciding how to allocate {drugName} inventory to health-centers.
28122.name: Dialogue

28149.content: In case you're not familiar with Saline solution, here is what it looks like. It is a mixture of sodium chloride in water which has a number of uses in medicine.
28149.name: Dialogue

28205.content: But do not worry about this as we have a management software that minimizes these costs by automatically ordering from our supplier.
28205.name: Dialogue

furniture.name: Text
